amendment.description: Amendment provides that none of the funds in the bill shall be available for processing immigrant or nonimmigrant visas to citizens of countries that the Attorney General determines deny or engage in unreasonable delay in accepting the return of criminal aliens.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in House Report 106-284 to add a new title which provides that none of the funds in the bill shall be available for immigrant or nonimmigrant visas to citizens of countries that the Attorney General determines engage in unreasonable delay in accepting return of their own criminal aliens.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Deal amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
